landing.headline: We help Squash players improve together
landing.subHeadline: Post a video of yourself playing and get advice from the Squash community
landing.communityIntro: Climb to the top with the best advice from the Squash community. A reputation and voting system ensures top advice always come out at the top.
landing.contributeIntro: Help others become better players. Get recognition from the community by giving advice and voting on what looks important to you.
landing.feature1Text: Directly control the video from the comment system to precisely illustrate what you need to say and see. Point to a specific image on a video, play a sequence in slow motion or loop it. You can even compare side-by-side sequences from two any two videos from the site to illustrate the difference between how the same move is done by a top player. And all directly from the comments!
landing.feature2Text: Get advice from the other players, and let the best comments surface to the top thanks to a voting system. You will soon be able to see how valuable the global contributions of each one is to the community, which will make identifying the best coaches even easier
landing.feature3Text: Professional coaches are available to help you identify your weaknesses and find out how you can improve on them. Ask them anything, they are here to help you out :) (and if you're a professionnal coach and interested in doing business on Zero to Heroes, feel free to contact us!)
landing.feature4Text: Your own unique experience is much more valuable than you might think. You've just mastered some techniques, tactics or simply understood something that others are struggling with. Right now, whatever your level, there's someone who needs your help. Leave them a small piece of advice, they'll be thankful for it :)

landing.feature1Text: Immediately link to an existing card or deck, so you have everything you need in a single place

upload.descriptionPlaceholder: To make the review more useful to you and more appealing to others (and so get more help), we advise you to review the replay once yourself, and point out the moments you were unsure or how you thought about what you did. It will give others specific points on which to help you, and will let them comment on your thought process as well as your actual decisions
upload.decklistTooltip: Supported providers: Zero to Heroes drafts, HearthArena drafts, ArenaDrafts drafts, HearthStats, HearthPwn, HearthPwn temporary decks (import can take up to one minute the first time), and hearthstone-decks decks

landing.headline: We help (e-)athletes improve together
landing.subHeadline: Post a video of yourself playing and get advice from the community. Start by picking your community below

landing.reviewToolsIntro: Identify and understand your flaws precisely. Watch any sequence in slow motion, in a loop, or even side-by-side with another sequence from a top player.
landing.coachIntro: If community advice is not enough for you, professional coaches are available to help you overcome your biggest hurdles
landing.sebDescription: I'm a software engineer by trade, and an athlete and gamer by heart. I've been frustrated by the difficulty to get advice adapted to my style, and want to help athletes and gamers get over that hurdle. I love meeting interesting people of all kind, so feel free to email me directly at seb@zerotoheroes.com :)
landing.thibDescription: Driven by logic and passionate about games I'm a software engineer who strongly believes that there is a bit of magic/awesomeness in everybody. Together we can be heroes! Feel free to share your thoughts with me at thibaud@zerotoheroes.com
landing.newsLetterSubHeadline: Subscribe to newsletter and get latest news
landing.noSpam: You know where to find us, so we won't spam

home.description: Welcome to Zero to Heroes! The site is dedicated to learning and improving, and whether you're a beginner looking for advice or a veteran wanting to help the other players, the community welcomes you warmly :)

choice.title: What do you want to do?
choice.watchlearnDescription: Get better by watching other videos who received the best advice from the community.
choice.getadviceDescription: Upload your own video to get advice from the community
choice.helpothersDescription: Give back to the community and help other players improve their game

hearthstone.watchlearnDescription: Learn more about your class or deck archetype by watching games played by others who received the best advice from the community.
hearthstone.getadviceDescription: Upload your own game or arena draft to get advice from the community
hearthstone.helpothersDescription: Give back to the community and help other players improve their game

listing.unsubscribeTooltip: Click to stop receiving notifications when a new review is posted
listing.subscribeTooltip: Click to be notified when a new review is posted

search.title: Text
search.unwantedTags: Tags you don't want to see

video.usefulTitle: Number of comments the author of the video marked as useful

search.headline: Advanced search
search.lookingFor: I'm looking for reviews that are public
search.ownVideos: ... and limit the search to my own reviews

helpful.onlyHelpful: only reviews with comments flagged as helpful
helpful.onlyNotHelpful: only reviews without comments flagged as helpful

search.subscribeTooltip: Get notified every time a new review that match your search criteria is posted
search.subscriptionOk: You have subscribed to the search results and will receive a notification each time a new review that match your criteria is posted. You can manage your subscription in your profile page

messages.empty: You don't have any messages here

preferences.emailContact: Allow me to send you an email from time to time (I promise not to spam)?
preferences.language: What language do you want to see the site in?

subscriptions.subscriptionDeleted: Your subscription has been removed. You won't receive any notification for it anymore
subscriptions.empty:
You don't have any subscription yet.
You can add a subscription by doing a search and clicking on "Subscribe". You will then receive a notification every time a new review that match your criteria is posted.

toolbar.sequence: Illustrate your comment with another video
toolbar.drawingfalse: Add shapes and drawings on the video
toolbar.drawingtrue: When you're done, re-click on the button to save your drawing and continue editing your comment

askPro.headline: Choose your coach
askPro.tableCaption: You can ask a professional coach / trainer to give you feedback on this video. Each coach may offer slightly different things, so be sure to check the icon before making your choice
askPro.name: Name
askPro.verifiedInfo: We have verified the coach information is accurate
askPro.confirmInfo:
To confirm the request to {{name}} for {{tariff}} to review your video, please enter your email address below. What he said: 

 {{conditions}}
askPro.proNotified: {{name}} has been notified of your request. They will get back to you soon. Stay tuned!

coach.goToPageTooltip: Click to go to their Coach page

formattingHelp.markdownText: You can use Markdow syntax to format your text (bold, italics, paragraphs, etc)
formattingHelp.markdownImage: You can add inline images using ![img-small](your_img_link). For medium and bigger images, use img-medium or img-big instead. Using any other text (like ![cool image](your_img_link)) will try to display the image in its original size
formattingHelp.timestamp: Use the timestamp icon to create a link to a specific moment in the video. You can freely adjust the timestamp figures to match exactly what you need
formattingHelp.slow: Use the slow motion icon to create a timestamp and make the video play in slow motion once the user clicks on it. You can change how much the video is slowed by changing the 0.5 figure after the s (the lower, the slower the video)
formattingHelp.loop: Use the loop icon to create a slow motion link, and make a one-second-long sequence that repeats endlessly. You can change the duration of the loop by changing the value after the L (L1.5 would mean a 1.5s loop)
formattingHelp.drawing: Use the drawing icon to create a timestamp with a drawing. Once you click on the icon, you will enter drawing mode. Simply click and hold on the white canvas on the video to draw anything you like, and click again on the icon to save. If you don't like what you just drew, simply erase the [tmp0] part in the comment, and start again!
formattingHelp.comparison: Use the side-by-side video icon to create a sequence with side-by-side videos, to compare two clips to show a difference. You can of course combine it with the other tools provided above (by default a sequence is created with loop and slow motion)

hearthstone.card: Add a link to a card name using [[The Card Name]]. This will create a hyperlink that will display the card on hover
hearthstone.deck: Add a link to a deck hosted on hearthpwn.com or hearthstone-decks.com using [your_deck_url]. This will create a hyperlink that will display the cards list on hover
hearthstone.mana: Show the mana symbol using the -mana keyword, eg 2-mana to show the 2 mana symbol

user.reputationExplanation: Your total reputation. You can increase it by giving useful advice to others
user.noAccount: If you don't have an account yet, please
user.incorrectCredentials: We're sorry :/ We couldn't find any account that matches your identifiers
user.createAccountHeadline: Would you like to create an account?
user.createAccountIntro: Creating an account is optional, and lets you earn reputation points when others vote on your comments (and lets you vote yourself), be notified when there are new comments, and lets you edit your contributions
user.createAccountIntro2: If you already have an account, you can just
user.name: Name
user.createAccountCancel: No thanks, I'll create my account later

visibility.privateTooltip: Private - doesn't show up in search result, and only you can see this review
visibility.restrictedTooltip: Restricted - doesn't show up in search result, and anyone with the link can see this review
visibility.publicTooltip: Public - shows up in search, anyone can see this review

sequence.headline: Adding a side-by-side comparison
sequence.addSequenceInfo: We'll add this sequence to the list of existing sequences, so that others can easily find and use it too. We'd love it if you could fill in the fields below to help them find it more easily :)
sequence.addSequenceTitle: A descriptive title that makes finding it easy

comment.upvote: Upvote this review (you should do this if you feel the review is valuable)
comment.downvote: Downvote this review (you should do this if you feel the review is illegible, poorly formatted or doesn't bring anything to the discussion)
comment.upvoteComment: Upvote this comment (you should do this if you feel the review is valuable)
comment.downvoteComment: Downvote this comment (you should do this if you feel the review is illegible, poorly formatted or doesn't bring anything to the discussion)
comment.unsubscribeReviewTooltip: Click to stop receiving notifications when a new comment is posted
comment.subscribeReviewTooltip: Click to be notified when a new comment is posted
comment.addCommentButton: Offer your help or ask a question

review.askProTooltip: Get professional advice on your review
review.restrictedAccess: The author of the review has restricted its access, and only they can see it

choice.title: What do you want to upload?
choice.videoDescription: Post a video of yourself playing

hearthstone.videoDescription: Post a video of one of your games. You can find help on how to record HS games one our blog
hearthstone.replayDescription: Post a replay or log file. You can find help on how to get one on our blog
hearthstone.arenadraftDescription: Upload your Arena draft. Full details on our blog
hearthstone.fromurlDescription: You already have a game or draft stored elsewhere? Just copy the URL to import the data

replay.headline: Upload a replay
replay.selectedFile: You're about to upload {{fileName}}. It needs to be processed before being a usable replay, and you'll be able to navigate in it at the next step
replay.invalidFormatMessage: We only support log files (.txt), hsreplay files (.xml) or Hearthstone Deck Tracker replay files (.hdtreplay) for now. If you wish to use another file format, please let us know on the forums
replay.someInvalidFilesMessage: Some of the files you are trying to upload don't contain any games. Don't worry, we'll ignore them, but it may indicate you're not uploading what you wanted. This mainly happens on mobile: the "hearthstone_2016_xx_xx_xx_xx_xx.log" files don't always contain actual game data, (the Power.log always does contain the data from your latest sesssion)
replay.corruptedFile: We couldn't detect the heroes from your replay - it looks like it is corrupted. Please make sure you have the latest versions of your tracker. Otherwise, let us know on the forums
replay.dontCloseWindowMessage: Your replay is being uploaded to our servers. Please don't close the window or you'll have to start all over again :(
replay.finalizeVideoMessage: Processing your file. It can take up to one minute. Then you'll be able to view your replay in the viewer on the left
replay.transferCompleted: Transfer completed. You can now publish your replay

multi.dontCloseWindowMessage: Your replay files are being uploaded to our servers. The game information will be automatically updated once the files have been converted into usable replays. Please don't close the window or you'll have to start all over again :(
multi.finalizeVideoMessage: Processing your files. It can take up to one minute, maybe more if you have many games. Then the info will be automatically filled for you
multi.transferCompleted: Transfer completed. You can now publish your replays
multi.filesAdded: You're about to upload {{games}} games in {{files}} files:
multi.canUploadMore: You can add more files by dropping them here (just be reasonable - we know it crashes with 600 files, and works with 10), or remove them by clicking on the delete icon.
multi.multiAnonymousErrorMessage: Unregistered users can only upload one game at a time. Please login or register to upload all your games at once (more info on why we do this here), or mark the games you don't want as "Skip" with the dropdown
multi.applyAllTooltip: There are some fields we can't yet populate automatically from the replay file, and that you have to enter manually. Clicking on this button will use the first review's fields values to populate all the other reviews

fromurl.headline: Upload from URL
fromurl.urlPlaceholder: URL of the page with your game/draft
fromurl.urlPlaceholderTooltip: If you have a draft or a game stored on another site, you can import it on Zero to Heroes by pasting its URL here. As of today, we support importing drafts from arenadrafts.com and heartharena.com and games from hsreplay.net
fromurl.unsupportedProvider: This provider is not supported yet. Please leave a message on the forums if you'd like us to be able to import message from there

arenadraft.headline: Upload an Arena draft
arenadraft.selectedFile: You're about to upload {{fileName}}. It needs to be processed before being a usable draft, and you'll be able to navigate in it at the next step
arenadraft.invalidFormatMessage: We only support files created by the Arena Helper plugin for Hearthstone Deck Tracker for now. They should come as .json files. If you wish to use another file format, please let us know on the forums
arenadraft.corruptedFile: We couldn't detect the picked cards from your file - it looks like it is corrupted. Please make sure you have the latest versions of your tracker. Otherwise, let us know on the forums
arenadraft.dontCloseWindowMessage: Your draft is being uploaded to our servers. Please don't close the window or you'll have to start all over again :(
arenadraft.finalizeVideoMessage: Processing your file. It can take up to one minute. Then you'll be able to view your draft in the viewer on the left
arenadraft.transferCompleted: Transfer completed. You can now publish your draft

video.headline: Upload a video
video.invalidFormatMessage: We're sorry, we only support .mp4, .ogg, .mkv and .webm video files. We can't provide our more advanced features if we have to rely on a Flash video player, which is mandatory for some file formats.
video.doubleSpeedLink: Double the speed of the video
video.doubleSpeedExplanation: When you double the video speed, the final video will be twice as fast (and twice as short) as the original, meaning you can use a video that is twice as long. You should use that if the general pace is slow enough to still be able to follow what happens
video.doubleSpeedReminder: You have decided to double the speed of the video - the final video will be twice as short as what you see on screen here
video.restoreSpeedExplanation: Reset the video to its original speed
video.whyLimit: Our goal is to keep the analysis as focused as possible - this will make it much easier for others to give you feedback. That's why we are enforcing a 5 minutes time limit on videos
video.videoTooLong1: The video clip selected is too long. Please keep it at 5 minutes max using the slider above
video.videoTooLong2: The video clip selected is too long. Please keep it at 5 minutes max using the slider or by doubling its speed above
video.automatedUpload: The video will be automatically published once the file upload is completed (you can still edit it afterwards if you're logged in). Just sit down and relax :)
video.dontCloseWindowMessage: Your video is being uploaded to our servers. Please don't close the window or you'll have to start all over again :(
video.finalizeVideoMessage: Finalizing your video. Depending on its size, it may take up to 5 minutes. Sit back and relax :)
video.transferCompleted: Transfer completed. You can now publish your video

upload.invalidFormatMessage: We're sorry, we only support .mp4, .ogg, .mkv and .webm video files. We can't provide our more advanced features if we have to rely on a Flash video player, which is mandatory for some file formats.
upload.fasterVideoText: The final video will be {{videoFramerateRatio}} times as fast (and as short) as the original, and won't have any audio.
upload.whyLimit: Our goal is to keep the analysis as focused as possible - this will make it much easier for others to give you feedback. That's why we are enforcing a 5 minutes time limit on videos
upload.fasterVideoClick2: to revert back to the original speed
upload.videoTooLong2: The video clip selected is too long. Please keep it at 5 minutes max using the slider or by doubling its speed above
upload.timeLimitExplanationText: Our goal is to keep the analysis as focused as possible, so that other people can easily search and benefit from comments on your video. Having a focused analysis will also make it much easier for others to give you feedback. That's why we are enforcing a 5 minutes time limit on videos. Please use the above slider to select the part of the video you need analyzed
upload.timeLimitExplanationText2: Our goal is to keep the analysis as focused as possible, so that other people can easily search and benefit from comments on your video. Having a focused analysis will also make it much easier for others to give you feedback. That's why we are enforcing a 5 minutes time limit on videos. Please either:
upload.timeLimiteReason1: Use the slider above the select up to 5 minutes of video to use
upload.timeLimitReason2: of the video to use up to 10 minutes of video. This is for now experimental and will only work if your video has less than 30 images per seconds (which is the case for most camera and phone videos, and the default for many video recording softwares)
upload.nameTaken: This name is already in use. Please pick another one, or
upload.descriptionPlaceholder: Any remarks about what you want to improve?
upload.timestampTranslationInfo: It looks like you are using timestamps and have changed the beginning time of your video. Don't worry that the timestamps text still reflects the original time of the video. We're making sure everything will be fine in the end :)

welcome.headline: Welcome to Zero to Heroes!
welcome.videoSuggestion: We're glad to see you here :) If you're looking for a place to start, why not have a look at this video?
welcome.reviewSuggestion: Hey! Glad to see you back today! How would you feel about helping someone out today? This review has not received any love lately, would you mind helping?
welcome.newcomer: It looks like you're new here. If you feel a bit lost, have a look at this presentation page to get a better idea of what we do here, or stop by the forums
welcome.latestFeaturesSubHeadline: We have continued to add features since the last time you visited. We hope you'll like them!
welcome.contactUs: Any comment or question? Let us know! Or by email

activities.helpfulComment: marked a comment as helpful at

help.title: Did you know?
help.commentVote: You can use the up and down arrows to reward a comment you have found useful. Comments with the most upvotes will naturally emerge at the top of the list
help.doubleScroll: If you scroll on the comment column it will scroll only the comments, letting you browse what everyone has said while keeping the video fully in view
help.fineScrolling: You can scroll frame by frame by using the mousewheel on the time bar, letting you choose your timestamp with more precision. You can scroll more quickly if you press the Shift key at the same time

news.news1: Zero to Heroes has been localized in French. Use the dropdown in the top right to change your language
news.news2: We've changed the video review layout to use the full width of the screen. Let us know what you think!
news.news3: HearthStone players can now see the details of a deck card without having to go to an external site
news.news4: HearthStone players can now also use the English name when searching for a card
news.news5: When displayed, the HearthStone deck title is now clickable to see the original deck
news.news6: You can now upload a video as a comment response. The new video will by default be hidden from search (you can see it if you remove the 'Sequence' tag filter
news.news7: [Beta] HearthStone players can now upload a game log file (produced for instance by HearthStone Deck Tracker). More details on the forums
news.videowidemode: Video player can now be put in "wide mode", which increases the size of the video player and decreases the size of the comments column
news.hsplayer_ui_1: HearthStone replay player has received a few graphical and gameplay improvements, and you can now access the full log of the game. Full details on the forums
news.own_video_1: You can now see all the videos / replays you submitted
news.hs_arena_1: Now possible to upload a HearthStone draft and have others advise you on your picks!
news.hsdecks_support: Now possible import a decklist from hearthstone-decks.com

lol0.description: Hi, my name is Julien, but I play as Sir4ur0n on most games. I've been playing League of Legends for quite some time now, and as a casual Rank player, I reached Platinum III. My main roles are Support/Mid/ADC, and what I really enjoy about this game is playing with the team to kill some nexus. I never focus on KDA or most gold earned, as it's usually counter-productive to focus on those indicators alone. see you later on the Rift =)
lol0.tariffDescription: In my reviews I will focus on your stuff, positioning, and actions to improve your added value to your team, and to help you make your team win the games. E.g. if you are a tank but stay behind your carries, or don't seize an opportunity to engage (and die in the process) so that your team could win. Don't necessarily expect my reviews to increase your KDA, but it will improve your win ratio.
